title: [Melgorehn's Reach, Tower]
description: Looming before you stands a tall grey tower shrouded in a misty fog.  A courtyard surrounds the tower and is protected by a massive portcullis.  A thin blanket of mist flows toward a narrow set of stairs leading down.

Looming before you stands a tall grey tower silhouetted by a dark mountain.  A courtyard surrounds the tower and is protected by a massive portcullis.  A few steps away lie a narrow set of stairs leading down.
